unresolved_hooks: Who was at the tower before the party arrived?
Why is the faction linked to the watchtower markings?
What threat is expected along the eastern road?
last_session_narrative: The party inspected a ruined watchtower, found faction-linked markings, and traced fresh signs of movement toward the eastern road. The group ended by planning how to continue the investigation.
plain_text_summary: The session focused on investigation, clue collection, and setting up the next objective.
